EmailTemplate.name: Annual re-enrollments
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Annual Subscription with Luxury Presence will be renewing soon
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
It’s that time of year! Your annual ::insert plan name:: subscription with Luxury Presence will automatically renew on ::insert date here::. If you’d like the option to move to monthly payments or if you have any questions regarding your subscription, please reply to this email before your renewal date.
If you need to update or add a new card on file, please do so by clicking on the link below and entering your email address associated with your account. You will then receive a separate email with a secure link where you can enter your new card.
Update credit card
Looking forward to another year,
Luxury Presence
Notes:
Can we attach their contract to the email?
Only downside to generating emails once a month is that we will potentially get an influx of replies all at once
